5.SNV correction

Source: vignettes/5.SNV correction.Rmd
5.SNV correction.Rmd

We adapt the script made by Z chen et al. of robust PCA (RPCA) for mutation data analysis, and thanks for their contributions.

One should put all Matlab scripts in the same folder, and execute the main.m for their own data.

clear
 
D=csvread('./example.snv.csv',1,1);
D=D'

[m,n]=size(D); 
ms=0; % value represents missing.
omega=find(D~=ms); 
omegaC=find(D==ms);
lambda=1/sqrt(max(m,n))*(1+5*length(omegaC)/(m*n));
[A1,E1]= RPCA(D,omega,lambda);

%% Integralization
AA1=int8(A1);
AA1=table(AA1)
writetable(AA1, 'example.mut1.csv');

Developed by Kewei Xiong, Ruofan Ding, Lei Li.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
